com.deezer.sdk.network.request.event

Class OAuthException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.deezer.sdk.network.request.event.DeezerError
          • com.deezer.sdk.network.request.event.OAuthException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OAuthException
extends DeezerError
    Indetifies an Exception during OAuth. Typically, an app will have to react to this kind of exception by trying to reconnect user. If the new reconnection still replies by an OAuthException, use Util.clearCookies() and try to reconnect again, offering the user a chance to change its credentials.
    Author:
    Deezer
